name: Boxbee, Inc.
description: Developer of an on-demand storage box delivery software designed to oversee logistically complex operations. The company's on-demand storage box delivery software helps customers to manage and retrieve their boxes online, enabling full service storage companies up and running.
one_liner: Developer of an on-demand storage box delivery software designed to oversee logistically complex operations. The company's on-demand storage box delivery software helps customers to manage and retrieve their boxes online, enabling full service storage companies up and running.
